Pre-Game Insights: Luis Gil is 12-6 with a 3.39 ERA in 24 starts and 12-7 with a 3.47 ERA in 31 starts.
Jordan Wicks is 2-2 with a 3.82 ERA in eight games (seven starts) and 6-3 with a 4.12 ERA in 15 career games (14 starts).
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees lost 10-6 to the Pittsburgh Pirates, giving up 14 hits and surrendering three runs in both the fourth and sixth innings.
The Cubs lost the first two games of their series against the Pittsburgh Pirates 5-0 and 5-3 but won the third game 12-0.
